display.title: Coconut Gun
description: Strewn with &&3Bamboo&&r and rarely &&aPandas&&r, &&2Bamboo Jungles&&r can be recognised from a great distance.
&&3Bamboo&&r can be combined into &&eBlocks&&r, whose planks can be used to craft &&dfurniture and boats&&r with a unique look.
Climbable &&3Scaffolding&&r, crafted from &&3Bamboo&&r, can support &&dtemporary towers&&r up to six blocks wide, &&dbreaking instantly&&r when unsupported.
&&aPandas&&r are neutral animals that like &&3Bamboo&&r, with &&3varying personality&&r types shown on their face.
Pandas can only be bred &&3among bamboo&&r, and can't be &&dtoo close together&&r or they'll instead become angered.
